# DVIIntelIMA

**Enumeration Case**

The DVI/Intel IMA Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.

## Declaration

```swift
DVIIntelIMA
```

## Pulse Code Modulation Formats

- **LinearPCM**: The linear Pulse-Code Modulation (PCM) format.
- **AppleIMA4**: The Apple implementation of IMA 4:1 Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.
